Quick Facts

EXIT   X

INTRODUCTION TO MONEY LAUNDERING

Page

Table of Contents

 

Failure to comply with your AML/CTF obligations can create other risks for you and your organisation. We will discuss the risks in more detail in Module 2.

 

Click on the terms below for more details

Allowing or assisting criminals to launder money through your organisation could severely damage both you and your organisation's reputation. It could also force your organisation to close down.  

If your organisation is used for money laundering, it may have to spend time, energy and money in assisting with investigations into money laundering.

If your organisation does not comply with its obligations under anti-money laundering law, it will face a number of serious legal risks, including fines, formal warnings, enforceable undertakings and injunctions.
